dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3991421M] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your serve
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2007 10:55 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3991421M] Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. http://www.hbuonline.net/ ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. http://www.hbuonline.net/ Added by system at Tuesday, May 8 2007 07:26 am X-MailFrom: tbryan@ient.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue May 8 07:26:42 2007 Received: (qmail 10115 invoked by alias); 8 May 2007 12:26:42 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 10112 invoked from network); 8 May 2007 12:26:40 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 8 May 2007 12:26:40 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 8 May 2007 07:26:40 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 08 May 2007 07:26:40 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from tbryan@ient.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HlOm7-0004cs-Vo for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 08 May 2007 07:26:40 -0500 Received: from mail34.syd.optusnet.com.au ([211.29.133.218]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from tbryan@ient.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HlOlu-000O25-9P for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 08 May 2007 07:26:27 -0500 Received: from tam (c220-237-110-150.blktn2.nsw.optusnet.com.au [220.237.110.150]) by mail34.syd.optusnet.com.au (8.13.1/8.13.1) with SMTP id l48CQCrj017686; Tue, 8 May 2007 22:26:15 +1000 Message-ID: <004201c7916c$1ae6d760$8c00a8c0@tam> From: "Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA" To: Cc: "Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA" Subject: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. http://www.hbuonline.net/ Date: Tue, 8 May 2007 22:21:28 +1000 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; type="multipart/alternative"; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_002E_01C791BF.39338FD0" X-Priority: 1 X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.3028 Disposition-Notification-To: "Tamara Bryan, Helbreath USA" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 May 2007 12:26:40.0536 (UTC) FILETIME=[21598980:01C7916C] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello, I am Tamara Bryan, Gamemaster of HelbreathUSA http://www.helbreathusa.com . I am contacting you in regards to a web site being hosted on your servers that is breaching the copyright laws. http://www.hbuonline.net/ The official game site of the developer is located at http://www.helbreath.com and legally licensed by http://www.helbreathusa.com. This web site is hosting information and files advertising and how to connect to their illegal server. We, iENT, are authorized by the copyright owner, Siementech, to seek out and close illegal servers. Their actions include copyright infringement and software piracy related material (code, images and sound). The participants are violating the copyright agreement resulting in your servers being used in an illegal fashion. Please take care of this abuse of our copyright and your Terms of Service by removing the web site and any files relating to the copyright. Siementech have a copyright statement found here http://inter.helbreath.com/sub1/whathb_am.htm. However, it does not permit the use of the source code to be used at all, and states that any information is to be for private use not to the public. The web site linked above has violated the terms of copyright and IEntertainment as the soul holder of a license to host the game have been given permission by Siementech to pursue this issue. It also covers the use of images, sound and brand name being illegally used. Given that the web site is not a "fan site" but an "illegal server site", we request your assistance. Please advise me of if you need any further information such as an NDA. Thank you for your prompt action in this matter. Sincerely, Tamara Bryan Game Master Helbreath USA MIME element (text/html)

Hello,

 

I am Tamara Bryan, Gamemaster of HelbreathUSA http://www.helbreathusa.com .  I am contacting you in regards to a web site being hosted on your servers that is breaching the copyright laws.

 

http://www.hbuonline.net/

 

The official game site of the developer is located at http://www.helbreath.com and legally licensed by http://www.helbreathusa.com.  This web site is hosting information and files advertising and how to connect to their illegal server.  We, iENT, are authorized by the copyright owner, Siementech, to seek out and close illegal servers.

 

Their actions include copyright infringement and software piracy related material (code, images and sound).

 

The participants are violating the copyright agreement resulting in your servers being used in an illegal fashion. Please take care of this abuse of our copyright and your Terms of Service by removing the web site and any files relating to the copyright.

 

Siementech have a copyright statement found here http://inter.helbreath.com/sub1/whathb_am.htm. However, it does not permit the use of the source code to be used at all, and states that any information is to be for private use not to the public. The web site linked above has violated the terms of copyright and IEntertainment as the soul holder of a license to host the game have been given permission by Siementech to pursue this issue. It also covers the use of images, sound and brand name being illegally used.

 

Given that the web site is not a
